```{ojs}
//| output: true
data_multiple_departement = {

    let topos ;
    
    if (selected_departements.length == 1){
        topos = get_departement(
            selected_departements,
            arrondissement ? "COMMUNE_ARRONDISSEMENT" : "COMMUNE",
            "geojson",
            year,
            simplification_percent
        )
        return topos
    }

    topos = get_multiple_departement(
            selected_departements,
            arrondissement ? "COMMUNE_ARRONDISSEMENT" : "COMMUNE",
            "geojson",
            year,
            simplification_percent
        )
    
    return topos
}
```
